# Interface DetectedTopicInterface

DetectedTopicInterface Represents a detected topic in the content with its confidence score.

interface DetectedTopicInterface {  
confidence: number;  
topicName: [TopicName](/enums/primitives_safety_types.TopicName);  
}

#### Hierarchy ([View Summary](/hierarchy#primitives/safety/types.DetectedTopicInterface))

  * [BasicTopicInterface](./primitives_safety_types.BasicTopicInterface)
    * DetectedTopicInterface



##### Index

### Properties

confidence topicName

## Properties

### confidence

confidence: number

Confidence score between 0 and 1

### topicName

topicName: [TopicName](/enums/primitives_safety_types.TopicName)

The type of topic detected

Inherited from [BasicTopicInterface](./primitives_safety_types.BasicTopicInterface).[topicName](./primitives_safety_types.BasicTopicInterface#topicname)
